children.description: Runtime context bundling backend, config, and kernel registry

children.description: Re-export of Musikell.Runtime.Kernel for the Accelerate backend
children.author: rahulmnavneeth

children.description: KernelSpec abstraction and KernelRegistry for kernel lookup and registration
children.author: rahulmnavneeth

children.title: Builtin Kernels
children.description: Index of all builtin kernel modules and the builtinRegistry
children.author: rahulmnavneeth

children.title: Channel Kernels
children.description: Channel split, merge, and mono-to-stereo manipulation kernels
children.author: rahulmnavneeth

children.title: Crossfade Kernel
children.description: Artifact-free route switching with linear crossfade between two inputs
children.author: rahulmnavneeth

children.title: Delay Kernels
children.description: Integer-sample and fractional interpolated delay lines
children.author: rahulmnavneeth

children.title: Dynamics Kernels
children.description: Compressor, limiter, and noise gate dynamics processing kernels
children.author: rahulmnavneeth

children.title: Envelope Kernel
children.description: ADSR envelope generator for amplitude shaping
children.author: rahulmnavneeth

children.title: Filter Kernel
children.description: State-variable filter (SVF) with lowpass, highpass, bandpass, and notch modes
children.author: rahulmnavneeth

children.title: Musikell.Runtime.Kernel.Foreign
children.description: Load external kernels from shared libraries via dlopen
children.author: rahulmnavneeth

children.title: Gain Kernel
children.description: Amplitude scaling kernel -- multiply every sample by a constant
children.author: rahulmnavneeth

children.title: IO Kernels
children.description: Input, output, passthrough, and null signal routing kernels
children.author: rahulmnavneeth

children.title: Mix and Clip Kernels
children.description: Signal mixing (summing) and hard clipping kernels
children.author: rahulmnavneeth

children.title: Noise Kernels
children.description: White, pink, and brown noise generators using xorshift PRNG
children.author: rahulmnavneeth

children.title: Oscillator Kernels
children.description: PolyBLEP band-limited oscillators: sine, square, sawtooth, triangle
children.author: rahulmnavneeth

children.title: Reverb Kernel
children.description: Feedback Delay Network (FDN) reverb with Hadamard mixing matrix
children.author: rahulmnavneeth

children.title: Sequencer Kernel
children.description: Beat pattern sequencer for rhythmic gating of audio signals
children.author: rahulmnavneeth

children.title: Musikell.Runtime.Kernel.Builtin.Util
children.description: Shared utilities for built-in kernels
children.author: rahulmnavneeth

children.title: Param
children.description: RampState -- per-sample parameter smoothing via linear ramp interpolation
children.author: rahulmnavneeth
